lines.gurmukhi: jYsy nIr KIr AMn Bojn Kuvwie AMiq gro kwit mwrq hY Ajw s√çwn kau
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Neer Kheer Ann Bhojan Khuvaai Anti , Garo Kaati Maarat Hai Ajaa Svaan Kau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a male off-spring of a goat, (a he-goat) is brought up by feeding him with milk and food, and at last he is killed by cutting his neck.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bhu Bwr fwrIAq lGu nOkw mwih bUfq hY mwJDwr pwr n gvn kau
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Bahu Bhaar Daareeat Laghu Naoukaa Maahi , Boodat Hai Maajhadhaar Paar N Gavan Kau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a small boat is loaded with excessive baggage, then it sinks in the middle of a river where the water is more turbulent. It cannot reach the far bank.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bur nwir Dwir Brn isMgwr qin Awip AwmY Arpq icMqw kY Bvn kau
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Bur Naari Dhaari Bharan Singaar Tani , Aapi Aamai Arapat Chintaa Kai Bhavan Kau ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a prostitute adorns herself with make up and ornaments to excite other males for indulging in vices with her, she herself acquires disease and worry in life.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy hI ADrm krm kY ADrm nr mrq Akwl jmlokih rvn kau ]636]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Hee Adharam Karam Kai Adharam Nara , Marat Akaal Jamalokahi Ravan Kau ?636?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, an immoral person dies before his death by indulging in unrighteous deeds. And when he reaches Yamlok (abode of angels of death), he bears more punishment and pain.  (636)
